snippet.title: Grime - Official Tinge of Terror DLC Launch Trailer | Guerrilla Collective 2023 Showcase
snippet.description: Watch the trailer to see what to expect with Grime’s Tinge of Terror DLC, which brings a New Game+ overhaul to the soulslike Metroidvania game. In Tinge of Terror, old enemies will challenge you in new ways, old bosses will return looking for revenge, and old pathways through the world will change as you explore something your memories of the world juxtaposed with everything exciting and new. The Tinge of Terror DLC for Grime is available now.
